code: import React from'react';import{Stack}from'@mui/material';import{categories}from'../utils/constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SideBar=_ref=>{let{selectedCategories,setselectedCategories}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stack,{direction:"row",sx:{overflowY:"auto",height:{sx:"auto",md:'95%'},flexDirection:{md:'column'}},children:categories.map((category,name)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>{setselectedCategories(category.name);},className:"category-btn",style:{background:category.name===selectedCategories&&"#fc1503",color:"white"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:category.name===selectedCategories?"white":"red",marginRight:"15px"},children:category.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{opacity:category.name===selectedCategories?"1":"0.8"},children:category.name})]},name))});};export default SideBar;
